mapper.select: select p.USERCODE, p.Link, p.TITLE, e.ADDRESS, e.SALARY from AD a join ADAPPLICATION p on(a.ADAPPNO = p.ADAPPNO) join "EB" e on(p.Link = e.EBCODE) where a."START" <= sysdate and a."END" >= sysdate and a.ADCATEGORY = 'employer' order by a.REGDATE desc

select p.USERCODE, p.Link, p.TITLE, e.ADDRESS, e.SALARY from AD a join ADAPPLICATION p on(a.ADAPPNO = p.ADAPPNO) join "WB" e on(p.Link = e.WBCODE) where a."START" <= sysdate and a."END" >= sysdate and a.ADCATEGORY = 'employee' order by a.REGDATE desc
select p.ENTERPRISE, p.Link, p.IMAGE from AD a join ADAPPLICATION p on(a.ADAPPNO = p.ADAPPNO) where a."START" <= sysdate and a."END" >= sysdate and a.ADCATEGORY = 'company' order by a.REGDATE desc
select POINT from SUBUSER where USERCODE = #{userCode}
mapper.update: update SUBUSER set POINT = POINT - 300 where USERCODE = #{userCode}
